root.name: SingStar '80s
root.description: Tracklists Billy Joel - Uptown Girl Dexy's Midnight Runners - Come On Eileen Duran Duran - Rio Erasure - A Little Respect Europe - Final Countdown Foreigner - I Want To Know What Love Is Madness - Our House Madonna - Material Girl Nena - 99 Red Balloons The Pretenders - Brass In Pocket Run DMC - It's Tricky Simple Minds - Don't You Forget About Me Soft Cell - Tainted Love Starship - We Built This City Survivor - Eye Of The Tiger Tears For Fears - Everybody Wants To Rule The World Tina Turner - The Best Wham! - Wake Me Up Before You Go-Go United Kingdom and Australia Only SongsAlice Cooper - Poison Belinda Carlisle - Heaven Is A Place On Earth Blondie - Atomic Culture Club - Karma Chameleon The Cure - Just Like Heaven On Sunshine Dolly Parton - 9 To 5 Fairground Attraction - Perfect Frankie Goes To Hollywood - The Power Of Love John Farnham - You're The Voice Kate Bush - Running Up That Hill Katrina And The Waves - Walking Marillion - Kayleigh Vanilla Ice - Ice Ice Baby America Only SongsBilly Ocean - Caribbean Queen Blondie - Heart Of Glass Culture Club - Do You Really Want To Hurt Me Cyndi Lauper - Time After Time Dead Or Alive - You Spin Me Round A Flock Of Seagulls - I Ran Kim Wilde - Kids In America Men At Work - Who Can It Be Now R.E.M. - Stand Squeeze - Tempted Thompson Twins - Hold Me Now Twisted Sister - We're Not Gonna Take It
